title: I got the approved email for PBE access but when i click to make an account its stuck on pending
body:
I got the approved email for PBE access but when i click to make an account its stuck on pending

can someone help me?

replies.body: I too received an email 8 days ago but when i go to create my account it says pending
its been over a year for me too i think
how long have you been waiting for an pbe account its been over a year for me
Im sure its for this account, it says ShadezExile - you're approved for PBE access

I looked into this for you, and the account you are posting from doesn't look like it's been accepted.  Double check any other accounts you have, as it may have been intended for another.  I hope that helps!
